Kevoree will drive a new node ...

November 10, 2012

Say Hello to Kevoree drone ;-) .

This work is done with JeD for local firefighters for emergency area monitoring.

The sensors are majors fonctionalities of our autonomics computing case studies, and for gas and temperature sensing, drones allow catching better than ever... of course there non only sensors in the story but also some embedded computer named RapsberryPI...

 

Stay tuned...
